纳米技术的三重威胁：推进精准癌症治疗针对肿瘤组织、细胞和细胞器的癌症纳米药物的设计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Nanotechnologys-triple-threat-Advancing- precision-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Nanotechnologys-triple-threat-Advancing- precision-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66ac5d42-5c86-47be-9c5f-ac3f8c5f07c8 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 04:13:00 -0400 Nanotechnology's triple threat: Advancing precision cancer treatment
CT 成像显示，接种 COVID-19 疫苗可预防严重的肺部病变研究人员确定了 COVID-19 疫苗接种如何影响肺部后遗症相关病理和严重感染的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/CT-imaging-reveals-that-COVID-19-vaccination-may-protect-against-severe-lung-pathology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/CT-imaging-reveals-that-COVID-19-vaccination-may-protect-against-severe-lung-pathology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b788b3a-3997-4932-80eb-2bd0cdb443a9 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 03:53:00 -0400 CT imaging reveals that COVID-19 vaccination may protect against severe lung pathology

新研究调查了乐伐替尼的免疫调节作用研究人员探索乐伐替尼治疗对晚期甲状腺癌患者的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/The-immune-modulatory-effect-of-lenvatinib-investigated-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/The-immune-modulatory-effect-of-lenvatinib-investigated-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ed3bc9b-2b23-46e4-800a-06d46fd3fbb2 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 03:35:00 -0400 The immune-modulatory effect of lenvatinib investigated in new study
INTEGRA Biosciences 的移液器有助于播下未来的种子加州种子和植物 (CSP) 实验室是加州领先的私人植物病理学和遗传学检测实验室，它正在使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 的 VIAFLO 96 和 VIAFLO 384 手持式电子移液器来简化其核酸提取和样品处理工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-to-sow-the-seeds-of-the-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-to-sow-the-seeds-of-the-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e747a1de-c5bb-403d-ae49-f43ce852d7d7 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 03:18:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences’ pipettes help to sow the seeds of the future
高水平 BPA 暴露可能影响男性生育能力科学家们讨论了双酚 A 对人类男性生育能力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/High-level-BPA-exposure-may-affect-male-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/High-level-BPA-exposure-may-affect-male-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0929605e-d3be-4abf-aa8c-4d885493c6db Wed, 09 Aug 2023 03:12:00 -0400 High-level BPA exposure may affect male fertility
2019 年美洲 569,000 人因抗生素耐药性死亡根据发表在《柳叶刀区域卫生-美洲》上的一篇新的同行评审论文，世卫组织美洲区域所有 35 个国家中有 569,000 人死亡与细菌耐药性 (AMR) 有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Antimicrobial-resistance-linked-to-569000-deaths-in-the-Americas-in-2019.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Antimicrobial-resistance-linked-to-569000-deaths-in-the-Americas-in-2019.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22fa8b5c-ca8f-4c77-9348-b11741fdc6bd Tue, 08 Aug 2023 23:13:00 -0400 Antimicrobial resistance linked to 569,000 deaths in the Americas in 2019
研究发现莱姆病细菌在变异水平上适应动物宿主一项研究探讨了导致莱姆病的细菌遗传变异背后的机制。莱姆病是美国最常见的媒介传播疾病，每年约有 476,000 例人类病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Lyme-disease-bacteria-adapt-to-animal-hosts-at-the-variant-level-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Lyme-disease-bacteria-adapt-to-animal-hosts-at-the-variant-level-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38847ca3-1f8f-4833-b6c9-817de2fc4743 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 23:07:03 -0400 Lyme disease bacteria adapt to animal hosts at the variant level, study finds
肝病相关研究中的空间分辨巨噬细胞表型分析这篇综述手稿强调了空间分辨巨噬细胞表型在肝病相关研究中的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Spatially-resolved-macrophage-phenotyping-in-liver-disease-lated-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Spatially-resolved-macrophage-phenotyping-in-liver-disease-lated-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee37b39b-68f8-4e76-915a-b36d2d5ba407 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:54:00 -0400 Spatially-resolved macrophage phenotyping in liver disease-related research
含糖饮料与肝癌和慢性肝病死亡率增加的风险有关大约 65% 的美国成年人每天饮用含糖饮料。慢性肝病是全世界发病和死亡的主要原因，可导致肝癌和肝病相关死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Sugar-sweetened-beverages-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-cancer-and-chronic-liver-disease-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Sugar-sweetened-beverages-linked-to-increased-risk-of-liver-cancer-and-chronic-liver-disease-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e89b5864-b04a-4c3b-9ee3-992088933acc Tue, 08 Aug 2023 22:48:00 -0400 Sugar-sweetened beverages linked to increased risk of liver cancer and chronic liver disease mortality
